then the motor suddenly stopped working. I tried calling their customer care
number for service, but I just kept getting response that someone would
contact me, but no one has contacted me till now even though it is more than 1
month since filing complaint

I hv been an owner of inalsa Maxie plus.Now, I hv bought inalsa fiesta
which,in my opinion,seems to be the best option in its range.Quality seems to
be fine,it's cost-effective, efficient & powerful at the same time.Go for
it!!!

I would say a nice way to sell the product. What happens in such cases that
manufactures leave you high n dry on demo/functionality aspect but the CD
included is really what fills the gap. So its not one shot tedious process of
searching online demo videos. N for product, so far so good. A reasonably good
product in reasonable price.

The spatula is weak. Started chipping on first use. Can't remove blades to
clean them. It says turn the blade knob - with what? Hands? It doesnt turn.
Very disappointed.

title: Best ever for Indian Kitchen
Had a problem, but they sorted it out!
Nice product, works smoothly so far.
Poor built quality and packaging
Great Product !!
Fantastic product. Fantastic build and quality
Excellent product with an economical price tag!
The mixer jar is the worst ever. the Juicer is of bad quality plastic ...
ie=UTF8&psc=1 Nice product, Value for money
good quality and easy to operate
review:
After long research and reading lots of review on almost from all brands such
as Philips, Havells, Bajaj, etc . finally my choice came at inalsa, but due to
its brand popularity I little hesitating to buy but finally I chose this
inalsa fiesta 650 watt Food Processor, with 5 year warranty on motor and after
this I am very happy to say it's my choice is very accurate , because it's
attachments and user part are very useful for Indian kitchen.

Its a good machine. However, their "Unbreakable Jar" broke in 2 weeks of light
- moderate use (just kneading atta) and now, i'm struggling to get a
replacement. I just tried out the blender jar and am not appreciative of the
design or fitting. It looks just too crude and I fear that the jar is just
gonna jump off when i use it.  
  
I have been using the cutting blade for chopping my veggies and am rather
happy with it. Works like a charm on cabbage. Onions.. come out too thin and
stringy. Havent really used the remaining fittings. so, even though i'm happy
with the performance, i'm not happy with the quality of the product.  
  
Update  
  
Soon after my complaint, the jar cap was replaced at no cost and my issue was
taken up at a war footing pace. Anyhow, even though I've had to experience a
minor inconvenience, I appreciate their follow up and the performance of the
food processor!

Writing the review after using this for almost a week. First of all thanks to
Amazon for sharp on time delivery and nice packaging. After delivery
surprisingly on next day received a call fron Inalsa cust care about demo.
Process was smooth and demo person was quite prompt and polite. Coming to the
food processor, Here are some pros and cons.  
Pros.  
1\. Motor is powerful and does not make much noise.  
2\. Attachments are quite handy and useful, especially atta kneading, finger
chips cutter and chopper are very effective.  
3\. Price is very much low as compared to other products.  
4\. Additinal attachments are easily available in the market.  
  
Cons,  
1\. Main processor body could have been little more smoother. Some burrs are
visible.  
2\. So many attachments take some space to be stored. But it has nothing to do
with product.

Extremely poor built quality, handle of main jar came off during shipping
itself, plastic quality is bad and edges rough and smelly. Disappointed by
quality of product and packaging (low quality cardboard, extremely bad design
of packaging), Amazon too did not take any precautions during shipping.

I bought this product for 3999/- which is one of the the best prices I could
get. Moreover, my family is using Inalsa - Food Processor (older variant) for
past 18 Years and still it works great. Now coming to the overall feedback:  
  
Delivery:  
\- Amazon delivered in real quick time. I got the product on 3 day after my
order. The packaging was great and steps were taken to ensure that nothing
happens as it is a highly fragile product.  
  
Pros  
\- All in One machine  
\- Quickly can get the work done. So delicious cooking is more easier now.  
\- Plastic and built in quality is perfect.  
\- Blades are just awesome does not require a change and are of Stainless
Steel  
\- Overload Protector comes in very handy  
\- Nice Safety features  
  
Cons  
\- Maybe at this price none with respect to the pros/benefits.  
  
Rest the food processor is worth buying and specially when you want it and are
getting a good deal.

Fantastic product. Fantastic build and quality. My mom and wife loved it. The
product almost does there half the kitchen work for them. 5 stars.

I bought this product couple of days ago after going through some of amazon's
previous review of the product and I must admit that the earlier reviews were
really very helpful to zero down my search for a good food processor within an
economical price tag. INALSA Food Processor is really working fine currently.
Performing all the jobs of a good food processor at ease and have not
encountered any technical issues as of now. Though it is just a week now using
this product but I feel that food processor will continue to meet our
expectation of a good food processor. I must say that you should just go for
this product in case if you really want a smart product without spending too
much on the purchase.

Poorest of the lot!!! Not worth anything. The mixer jar is the worst ever. the
Juicer is of bad quality plastic and I am damn sure it won't even last more
than 3 months. Extremely dissatisfied

https://www.amazon.in/gp/product/B011B7WMN8/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o06_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1

review:
Purchased the product on 19 January, 2k18 and received the product on 20
January, 2k18.Free Home demo guy came on 25 January, 2k18. Since 25th, used
the product for about 7 or 8 times and explored all the features.  
Loving it.

The product is very good. It made kitchen work very easy. It is just easy to
handle.Overall the product is amazing. The product is as it looks in pictures.
It is value for money. I will recommend this to all the buyer seeking to buy
food processor to buy one from inalsa with a better price range.

Worst product. I buy this product and within a week it started giving problems
after lot of calls technician will cum and also take the service charges even
though it's in warranty. If you are thinking to buy please go for other band
company, this is totally waste of money. Please don't buy.

Received the pack in tact, no damages. put to use and satisfied with its
performance. best fit for a small size family. carrot halwa for 20 persons
-shredding took just 5 min for 2 kg carrot. ata kneeding for soft chapatis is
just easy, with perfect blend. the right product at this price.

Great Product and Quality is excellent. Demo was given by Inalsa Executive and
the executive's attitude was really appreciable. Overall, I loved this
product. VALUE FOR MONEY !!!  
Inalsa manufactured a very quality product and all the features are working
very fine. You can go for it if you want a very good food processor with an
economic deal.

Great product!  
Had a similar model from Inalsa which was heavily used for 15 years without
much issues. Have re-purchased the product and am satisfied.  
\- jars are of good quality  
\- basic functions - kneading,chopping etc work great  
\- Citrus juicer is OK  
\- Additional blades for slicing etc are not much used.  
\- Can be easily repaired locally as well

The lock on centrifugal mesh for juicer broke on 2nd use. Machine itself is
very noisy. Build quality is quite cheap. It just looks glossy from outside,
the attachments, jars are poor quality. Waste of money for me

In this price range, Inalsa Fiesta 650-Watt Food Processor is really
addressing all the features it boasts for. So far we are very happy with this
product. The customer service for Inalsa is very effective as well, I had a
small issue with one of the jar cover, which was resolved swiftly. Overall we
will definitely recommend this product.

Happy with the product, it's easy to use once you get a hang of it. I wish the
quality of build was better though. During the first use the main knob broke,
but fortunately the guy coming the give the demo the next day fixed it by
replacing the broken part. Has been running properly since.

review:
Best it is. I recommend everyone to you. I received in 2 days and was afraid
when I read negative reviews. But it is fantastic. I specially wanted for
kneading dough. Believe me in a minute my dough was ready for rotis. This made
me so happy. Finally got relief from kneading a boring and time wasting job I
use to fill . Thanks inalsa. W's afraid to buy seeing cheap price but now no
worries. Hurray

Too good product. Now I can do every of my work in seconds without strain.

An Inalsa Fiesta Food Processor was delivered to me on 8 Jan., 2018. I waited
over a week to start using it because the processor bowl could not be removed
from the base to be washed, as the joint was stuck.  
Recently, I tried grinding idli batter in the bowl and found the consistency
unsatisfactory even after repeated attempts. I therefore tried the liquidizer
bowl and found it doing a better job. However, after the first lot was done,
the liquidizer bowl refused to get dislodged, as of it was stuck to something.
The machine could still be operated when in locked position. As I suspected
that the base of the liquidizer may have got heated, although I ran it
intermittently, only for 6 minutes, I waited and tried again and again, till
it finally came unstuck. However, I found scraps of white plastic at the base.
It continued to work for the remaining lots of batter, but I am disgusted that
this should happen so early. Two people have to work in unison to dislodge the
processor bowl from the base.

I bought this food processor around 5 days ago from amazon India at the cheap
price of 3779 only . I purchased this product mainly to make all the kitchen
tasks easy like atta kneading aur shredding etc. The products does what
exactly what it claims. I used this product for the first time for kneading
atta but I was not very successful as it became quite wet.But as I followed
the instruction CD available with it and the videos available on youtube, I
became master in it. Thus, I would like to suggest you to go through all the
instructions before using it and you will be amazed by the results. The food
processor really makes every task like a children's play. We can also take out
healthy juices in 2 minutes.It also comes with many safety features.At the
last, I would like to tell you that this is the best food processor available
in this price range and you should definitely go for it. Its a value for money
priduct and I am satisfied with it a lot.

Product received as scheduled however the wire and other parts not that
impressive and we also tried to start the machine once it arrived but it would
not start at all!! We had purchased it based on some good reviews however we.
Have not had a good experience with this little known brand...

and amazing. Hope no issues in near future.

Great product!  
Had a similar model from Inalsa which was heavily used for 10 years without
much issues (Normal wear an tear excluded). Have re-purchased the product and

\- jars are of good quality  
\- basic functions - kneading,chopping etc work great

Have been using 450w inalsa food processor from past 10 years. No complaints
untill now. But lately I was making peanut butter and I realised the motor
used to overheat and stop. It must have fried or so. Since it was a 10year old
machiene I bought new one. So far so good. Only thing I feel is the built
quality is not very premium. But it does the work. It contains all the jars
and blades which you could possibly need.
